metaDescription: Claim your name, tag and other information.
heading: Claim XCH Address

form.heading: Claim your name, tag and other information
form.content: Claim your Name Tag and add other information related to your XCH address by filling in the form below. For each edit request, we will ask for a {{amount}} XCH deposit to prove your address ownership.

info.label: Deposit {{amount}} XCH to the following address to prove your ownership:
info.tooltip: The sending address must be identical to the address you wish to add information to.

form.successMessage: Thank you, we will review your application and list it after its been approved
